description: This file defines the DiscoverScreen widget for a Flutter music streaming app, displaying trending tracks and recommended albums with mock data, including asynchronous data loading and UI construction.

classes.name: DiscoverScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the discover page, showcasing trending tracks and albums.

classes.name: _DiscoverScreenState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching and UI state for DiscoverScreen.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches trending tracks and recommended albums, then updates the widget state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, including headers, loading indicators, and lists of tracks and albums.
